body: Hmm... some parts are not so clear. Kanato, the protagonist, is still sad from losing Cafe, his pet cat. Then his childhood friend Ema came to him, possessed by Cafe who wants to have sex with him. He thought she had enough, but Cafe came back saying she's not satisfied until seeing his children. Then, she switched back to show him Ema also enjoys having sex. After he fell asleep, Cafe implied Ema herself is actually using Cafe as excuse to get closer to Kanato. Author mentioned about wanting to make continuation. He likes sex position from behind and doesn't get to draw enough of it this time. Also not enough cat trivia included.
Its a pity it doesn't have translation
